Straight Shot looks back to Leo Prime with a nearly heart broken expression=
 on her face.  

" I'll do as you say, but I still think you don't believe =
in my brother.  There's a difference between believing and depending.  If y=
ou don't believe then how can you ever aspire with what matters most?  A le=
ader without a heart is as good as if there wasn't one ta begin with."

She=
 turns to do as ordered, as does Rattrap.

" My brother might make mistakes=
 but he has something well worth the compensation.  He has a heart and a bi=
g one. If you got ta really know him you would see that too.   Cmon Rattrap=
, we better get going."

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On =
Sep 14, 2011, at 12:29 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
=

> > <OLD>
> >

's statement.
> >
> > " He's right Leo, my brother started something becaus=
e he believes that even
> > the worst of enemies can come together to comba=
t a greater evil than
> > themselves. Hate ta break it to ya but, you don't=
 seem ta believe in him do
> > you? You think everything he inspires us to =
do is insane, but it's not. We
> > learn more about ourselves and we grow f=
rom these experiences. But you
> > don't seem ta want that ta happen. Pleas=
e, for Primus sake, give us a
> > chance to learn from our experiences inst=
ead of sheltering us from them."
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> There was a look from LEO =
PRIME as he turned to regard STRAIGHT SHOT,
> "Don't believe in him?" he sa=
id with a cool tone. "I am depending on
> what he started since it may be o=
ur only means of salvaging this
> mission."
> 
> LEO glanced at LORD ELDER =
who only nodded to him encouragingly.
> 
> He looked back at RAT TRAP and S=
TRAIGHT SHOT, "report to the docking
> bay. I have a certain Predacon to ta=
lk to first. Either way we are
> going to finish this."
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Pre=
ston
>

There was a look fro=
m LEO PRIME as he turned to regard STRAIGHT SHOT,<br>
"Don't believe in him=
?" he said with a cool tone. "I am depending on<br>
what he started since i=
t may be our only means of salvaging this<br>
mission."<br>
<br>
LEO glance=
d at LORD ELDER who only nodded to him encouragingly.<br>
<br>
He looked ba=
ck at RAT TRAP and STRAIGHT SHOT, "report to the docking<br>
bay. I have a =
certain Predacon to talk to first. Either way we are<br>
going to finish th=
is."<br>
